summary: Amulets that give 100% reduced magicka cost for casting spells from the respective school
descriptionHtml:
Mage's Amulets v1.0 by Th3Duke99088
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Intro
--------------

What do you use your necklace slot for? I use it for "Fortify (Magic School) __%" Enchantments..
But, I don't want to have to use up all my other pieces of armor just for no mana cost!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description
--------------

These Necklaces, nay, Amulets are pre-enchanted with "Fortify (Magic School) 100%" enchantments. They are all Craftable at a forge with a gold or silver ingot, a grand soul gem, and various other magical items.. Don't get too excited though... you need the Glass Smithing and Daedric Smithing Perks...

They are also found somewhere in the world...

Hint:
A Mage looks up from their bed,
Bear, Cat, and Wolf... Amulets ...Skulls

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Installation
--------------

Put the .esp in the Skyrim Data folder

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits
--------------

Bethesda - For making skyrim and the creation kit
Me - For everything else

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tools Used
--------------

Creation Kit

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Down here is the exact location of the pre-made ones



































Are you sure?



































Really?



































Alright....



































Where they are in the world: slluks reed 2 eht erofeb teksab a ni deb eht fo tfel ,sretrauQ s'egamhcrA
author: Th3Duke99088
